Author: LowCalPal
Text: I've been on lexapro for a few months and I feel like I'm bingeing way more.  I've gained 15 lbs and I'm planning on telling my doctor I want to try something else.

Author: ddmar
Text: I lost about 10 pounds on lexapro and gained about 10 pounds when I went off of it. I'm not sure when I noticed the weight on either end though, and what actually contributed to the weight gain/loss since my lifestyle changed a lot in the different times
